SELECT ID AS id , BUYER_ID AS buyerId , CLASSES_CODE AS classesCode , MACHINING_CODE AS machiningCode , BREED_CODE AS breedCode , STANDARD_ID AS standardId , GNQ_STD_ITEM_ID AS gnqStdItemId , GNQ_STD_ITEM_NAME AS gnqStdItemName , OK_VAL AS okVal , OK_VAL_AGREE AS okValAgree , NG_VAL AS ngVal , DESCRIPTION AS description , REMARK AS remark , IS_RESEARCH AS isResearch FROM by_research_std_gnq WHERE BUYER_ID = #{filterMap.buyerId} AND STANDARD_ID = #{filterMap.standardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO by_research_std_gnq ( ID, BUYER_ID, CLASSES_CODE, MACHINING_CODE, BREED_CODE, STANDARD_ID, GNQ_STD_ITEM_ID, GNQ_STD_ITEM_NAME, OK_VAL, OK_VAL_AGREE, NG_VAL, DESCRIPTION, REMARK, IS_RESEARCH, DEL_FLG, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME, ACT_ID, ACT_TIME, VER ) SELECT @rownum:=@rownum + 1 + a.maxId as id , #{buyerId} AS buyerId , #{classesCode} AS classesCode , #{machiningCode} AS machiningCode , #{breedCode} AS breedCode , #{standardId} AS standardId , a.GNQ_STD_ITEM_ID AS gnqStdItemId , a.GNQ_STD_ITEM_NAME AS gnqStdItemName , a.GNQ_OK_VAL AS okVal , '0' AS okValAgree , a.GNQ_NG_VAL AS ngVal , '' AS description , a.REMARK AS remark , '0' AS isResearch , #{delFlg} , #{updId} , #{updTime} , #{updId} , #{updTime} , #{updId} , #{updTime} , #{ver} FROM ( SELECT @rownum:=0 AS rowNum , (SELECT ifnull(MAX(ID), 0) FROM by_research_std_gnq) AS maxId , std.GNQ_STD_ITEM_ID , item.GNQ_STD_ITEM_NAME , std.GNQ_OK_VAL , std.GNQ_NG_VAL , std.REMARK FROM pd_gnq_std std INNER JOIN pd_gnq_std_item item ON item.GNQ_STD_ITEM_ID = std.GNQ_STD_ITEM_ID AND item.IS_CATALOG = '1' WHERE std.STANDARD_ID = #{standardId} AND std.DEL_FLG = '0' ORDER BY std.GNQ_STD_ITEM_ID) a
